summary: DRIVERS SEAT WILL NOT STAY LATCHED TO THE FLOOR OF THE CAR, AND SEAT BOUNCES AS I DRIVE.  WAS REPAIRED AT DEALERSHIP IN DEC 2007, BROKE AGAIN IN JUNE 2008.  DEALERSHIP REFUSES TO ACCEPT RESPONSIBILITY.  SUGGESTS REPLACING THE SEAT FRAME FOR $700.  NORMAL USE OF A DRIVERS SEAT SHOULD NOT CAUSE THIS TYPE OF AN ISSUE. *TR
